changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT * FROM ((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.ci_name) as column1,''Total'' as column2 FROM sre_ci_metadata s WHERE apm_type=''DT'' AND ci_type = ''Host'' ) UNION ALL (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.ci_name),''Events'' FROM sre_event e JOIN sre_ci_metadata s ON e.rootCauseEntity =s.ci_name AND e.project_id = (e.project_id) AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1800, getdate()))AND (getdate()) AND STATUS=''OPEN'' AND ci_type = ''Host'' AND eventType=''Alert'' AND apm_type=''DT'' AND apmType = ''DT'') UNION ALL (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.ci_name),''Issues'' FROM sre_ci_metadata s JOIN sre_event e ON e.rootCauseEntity=s.ci_name WHERE e.project_id = (e.project_id) AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1, getdate()))AND (getdate()) AND e.status=''OPEN'' AND apmType = ''DT'' AND apm_type=''DT'' AND eventType=''Issue'' AND ci_type = ''Host'')) AS countHost;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}' WHERE name = 'countdatasetHost_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT * FROM( (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.ci_name) as column1,''Total'' as column2 FROM sre_ci_metadata s WHERE ci_type = ''Service'' ) UNION ALL (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.ci_name),''Events'' FROM sre_event e JOIN sre_ci_metadata s ON e.rootCauseEntity =s.ci_name AND e.project_id = (e.project_id) AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1, getdate()))AND (getdate()) AND STATUS=''OPEN'' AND ci_type = ''Service'' AND eventType=''Alert'' AND apmType = ''DT'') UNION ALL (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.ci_name),''Issues'' FROM sre_ci_metadata s JOIN sre_event e ON e.rootCauseEntity=s.ci_name WHERE e.project_id = (e.project_id) AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1, getdate()))AND (getdate())AND e.status=''OPEN'' AND apmType = ''DT'' and eventType=''Problem'' AND ci_type = ''Service'')) AS countService;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'countdatasetservice_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT display_name AS ''Host'',ci_name,CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sre_event WHERE rootCauseEntity = a.ci_name AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1, getdate()))AND (getdate()) AND project_id = (project_id) AND apmType = ''DT'' AND STATUS=''OPEN'' )>0 THEN ''red'' ELSE ''green'' END AS ''status'' FROM sre_ci_metadata a WHERE a.project_id = a.project_id AND apm_type=''DT'' and ci_type=''Host'' GROUP BY ci_name,display_name,ci_last_updated ORDER BY STATUS DESC,ci_last_updated DESC;","Cacheable":"false","isStreaming":"false","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":""}'WHERE name = 'StatusHost_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT display_name AS ''App'',ci_name,CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sre_event WHERE rootCauseEntity = a.ci_name AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1, getdate())) AND (getdate())AND project_id = (project_id) AND apmType = ''DT'' AND STATUS=''OPEN'' )>0 THEN ''red'' ELSE ''green'' END AS status FROM sre_ci_metadata a WHERE a.project_id = a.project_id AND apm_type=''DT'' AND ci_type=''Application'' GROUP BY ci_name,display_name,ci_last_updated ORDER BY status DESC,ci_last_updated DESC;","Cacheable":"false","isStreaming":"false","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":""}'WHERE name = 'StatusApp_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(eventId) as column1 FROM sre_event e INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = e.rootcauseentity WHERE e.project_id = (e.project_id) AND apmtype = ''DT'' AND e.eventType=''Issue'' AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -730, getdate()))AND (getdate());","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'problemcountrectified_new_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT FORMAT(Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01''), ''%m/%d/%y %H:%i:%s'') AS ''Date'', COUNT(DISTINCT eventId) AS COUNT FROM sre_event e INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = e.rootcauseentity WHERE e.project_id = (e.project_id) AND e.eventType=''Issue'' AND apmtype = ''DT'' AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -730, getdate()))AND (getdate())GROUP BY startTime, datepart(hour,Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'')) ORDER BY startTime DESC;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'IssuetrendhourlyHG_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT eventId) AS ''count'',STATUS as ''status'' FROM sre_event p INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = p.rootcauseentity WHERE p.project_id = (p.project_id) AND p.eventType=''Issue'' AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(p.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -730, getdate()))AND (getdate()) AND apmtype = ''DT'' GROUP BY STATUS;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'opencloseissuecountHG_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT p.rootCauseEntity, c.display_name, COUNT(DISTINCT p.eventId) as count FROM sre_event p INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = p.rootcauseentity WHERE p.project_id =p.project_id AND p.eventType=''Issue'' AND apmtype = ''DT'' AND p.rootCauseEntity!=''(NULL)'' AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(p.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1800, getdate()))AND (getdate()) GROUP BY p.rootCauseEntity, c.display_name ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT p.eventId) DESC;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'problemperrootcauseentityHG_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(eventId) as column1 FROM sre_event e INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = e.rootcauseentity WHERE e.project_id = (e.project_id) AND apmtype = ''DT'' AND e.eventType=''Alert'' AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -730, getdate())) AND (getdate()) ;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'eventcountrectifiedHG_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') AS ''Date1'', COUNT(DISTINCT eventId) AS ''COUNT'' FROM sre_event e INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = e.rootcauseentity WHERE e.project_id = (SELECT id from usm_project where name = ''@projectname'') AND e.eventType=''Alert'' AND apmtype = ''DT'' AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1800, getdate()))AND (getdate()) GROUP BY e.startTime, Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') ORDER BY startTime DESC;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'alertstrendhourlyHG_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT eventId) as ''count'',STATUS FROM sre_event p INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = p.rootcauseentity WHERE p.project_id = (p.project_id) AND p.eventType=''Alert'' AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(p.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -730, getdate()))AND (getdate()) AND apmtype = ''DT'' GROUP BY STATUS;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'alertsdonut_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT p.rootCauseEntity,c.display_name, COUNT(DISTINCT p.eventId) as count FROM sre_event p INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = p.rootcauseentity WHERE p.project_id = p.project_id AND p.eventType=''Alert'' AND apmtype = ''DT'' AND p.rootCauseEntity!=''(NULL)'' AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(p.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1800, getdate()))AND (getdate()) GROUP BY p.rootCauseEntity,c.display_name ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT p.eventId) DESC;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'AlertsPerRootCause_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT number) AS ''count'',state as ''state'' FROM @projectname_tickets WHERE openedDate BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -2000, getdate()))AND (getdate())AND description LIKE ''%DT%'' AND configurationItem LIKE ''CPU_Issue%'' GROUP BY state;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'OpenClosedTicketsCount_DT' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(eventId) AS ''COUNT'' FROM sre_event e INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = e.rootcauseentity WHERE c.project_id =(e.project_id) AND e.project_id=(SELECT id from usm_project where name = ''@projectname'') AND c.ci_type IN (''Service'',''Host'') AND apm_type = ''AppD'' AND e.eventType=''Issue'' AND e.severityLevel=''CRITICAL'' AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1800, getdate()))AND (getdate());","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'ProblemsCount' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS ''COUNT'' , Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(p.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') AS ''DATE'' ,DATENAME(HOUR, Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(p.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') ) AS ''hourlyValue'' FROM sre_event p INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = p.rootcauseentity WHERE p.project_id = c.project_id AND c.project_id = (SELECT id from usm_project where name = ''@projectname'') AND apmType = ''AppD'' AND p.severityLevel=''CRITICAL'' AND c.ci_type IN (''Service'',''Host'') AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(p.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -800, getdate())) AND (getdate()) GROUP BY p.startTime;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'IssuesHourlyTrend' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS ''COUNT'', STATUS as ''status'' FROM sre_event p INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = p.rootcauseentity GROUP BY p.status;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'OpenCloseIssuesCount' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT p.rootCauseEntity AS ''root'' , COUNT(p.rootCauseEntity) AS ''count'' FROM sre_event p INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = p.rootcauseentity WHERE p.project_id = (SELECT id from usm_project where name = ''@projectname'') AND c.project_id = p.project_id AND apmType = ''AppD'' AND p.rootCauseEntity!=''NULL'' AND p.severityLevel=''CRITICAL'' AND c.ci_type IN (''Service'',''Host'') AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(p.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1800, getdate()))AND (getdate()) GROUP BY p.rootCauseEntity;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'ProblemCountRootCauseEntity' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS ''COUNT'' FROM sre_event e INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = e.rootCauseEntity AND c.ci_type=''Host'' WHERE Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1800, getdate()))AND (getdate()) AND e.project_id = (SELECT id from usm_project where name = ''@projectname'') AND e.severityLevel=''WARNING'' AND apmType=''AppD'';","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'EventsCount' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(*) AS ''COUNT'', Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') AS ''DATE'' ,DATENAME(HOUR, Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') ) AS ''hourlyValue'' , COUNT(eventId) AS ''COUNT'' FROM sre_event e INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = e.rootCauseEntity WHERE apmType = ''AppD'' AND e.project_id = (SELECT id from usm_project where name = ''@projectname'') AND apmType = ''AppD'' AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1800, getdate()))AND (getdate()) AND e.severityLevel=''WARNING'' AND c.ci_type=''Host'' GROUP BY startTime;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'AlertTrendHourly' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(eventId) AS ''COUNT'', e.status AS ''STATUS'' FROM sre_event e INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = e.rootCauseEntity WHERE e.project_id = (SELECT id from usm_project where name = ''@projectname'') AND apmType = ''AppD'' AND c.ci_type =''Host'' AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1800, getdate())) AND (getdate()) AND e.severityLevel=''WARNING'' GROUP BY e.status;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'OpenCloseAlertsCount' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT e.rootCauseEntity AS ''ROOT'',COUNT(e.rootCauseEntity) AS ''COUNT'' FROM sre_event e INNER JOIN sre_ci_metadata c ON c.ci_name = e.rootCauseEntity WHERE e.project_id = (SELECT id from usm_project where name = ''@projectname'') AND c.project_id = e.project_id AND apmType = ''AppD'' AND e.rootCauseEntity IS NOT NULL AND Dateadd(SECOND,(CAST (substring(e.startTime,1,10) AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -1800, getdate()))AND (getdate()) AND e.severityLevel=''WARNING'' AND c.ci_type=''Host'' GROUP BY e.rootCauseEntity;","Cacheable":false,"isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}'WHERE name = 'AlertsRootCauseEntity' AND organization = 'leo1311';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT number) AS ''COUNT'' FROM @projectname_tickets WHERE Dateadd(DAY,(CAST (openedDate AS bigint)),''1970-01-01'') BETWEEN (DATEADD(DAY, -180, getdate()))AND (getdate()) AND description LIKE ''APPD%'' AND configurationItem LIKE ''%_CPUIssue%'';","Cacheable":"false","isStreaming":"false","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":""}'WHERE name = 'APPDIncidentCount' AND organization = 'leo1311';
